featured.text: Through a projector, this attractive radio-alarm-clock is able to display the time onto a wall, ceiling, or anywhere __23__.

definition.zh_def: 投影機，一種將影像或視頻投射到屏幕或牆面上的設備。
definition.en_def: A device that projects an image or video onto a screen or wall.
definition.example: We used a projector to display the presentation during the meeting.
